.. _`analyzeSwitchConsequences`:

ANALYZESWITCHCONSEQUENCES
=========================

Predicting Switch Consequences





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_analyze_cpat:
        input:
            switch_list = "switch_list.RDS"
        output:
            rds = "switch_list_consequences.RDS"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/isoformSwitchAnalyzeR/analyzeSwitchConsequences"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* extra (str): Extra parameters for analyzeSwitchConsequences excepted 'switchAnalyzeRlist' and 'consequencesToAnalyze'
* consequences (List(str)): List of consequences to search for: ['intron_retention','coding_potential','NMD_status','domains_identified','ORF_seq_similarity']




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris

----
